title: Episode 67: The Olympic Silver Metal? What a Bummer!
description: Psychologists say that winning the silver medal - coming in second - is actually less satisfying than coming in third - the bronze.  Why is that?  Sounds weird, but it also sounds right, doesn't it?  Have you ever come in second in a contest or received an A- instead of an A?  Find out why winning the silver is...a bummer.
